00223       class reactor_iterator
00224        :public boost::iterator_facade< reactor_iterator,
00225                                    reactor_id, 
00226                                    boost::forward_traversal_tag,
00227                                    reactor_id > {
00228       public:
00233        reactor_iterator() {}
00240        reactor_iterator(reactor_iterator const &other)
00241          :m_iter(other.m_iter) {}
00248        explicit reactor_iterator(details::reactor_set::const_iterator const &i)
00249          :m_iter(i) {}
00251        ~reactor_iterator() {}
00252                                           
00253        
00254       private:
00255        friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00256 
00263        void increment() {
00264          ++m_iter;
00265        }
00273        bool equal(reactor_iterator const &other) const {
00274          return m_iter==other.m_iter;
00275        }
00281        reactor_id dereference() const {
00282          return m_iter->get();
00283        }
00284 
00285        details::reactor_set::const_iterator m_iter;
00286       }; // TREX::transaction::graph::reactor_iterator
